item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 3)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 3)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Historian (Level 5)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 2)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Seamstress (Level 4)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Author (Level 6)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 3)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Master Carpenter (Level 14)
item.description: Custom git hooks are installed which help catch issues before they are shared.

item.title: Inventor (hooks)
item.description: Used a command that isn't part of the built in Git command

item.title: Presenter (Level 4)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Apprentice Presenter (Level 3)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Messenger (Level 5)
item.description: Applied a patch using git am.

item.title: Apprentice Collector (Level 2)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Apprentice Locksmith (Level 2)
item.description: Add Signed-off-by line at the end of the commit log message using git commit -s.

item.title: Historian (Level 4)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Let there be light
item.description: Commit without a parent.

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 2)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Cherry Picker
item.description: Used git cherry-pick to add a sha from another branch into the current branch.

item.title: Apprentice Collector (Level 1)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Master Carpenter (Level 9)
item.description: Custom git hooks are installed which help catch issues before they are shared.
